funding.title: Vendia Named a 2021 Gartner Cool Vendor in Cloud Computing
funding.description: Vendia is included in Gartner's May 2021 Cool Vendors in Cloud Computing report

funding.title: Announcing the Vendia Share Developer Preview!
funding.description: Launch announcement for the Vendia Share Developer Preview and Vendia's Series A
funding.longDescription: Vendia is excited to announce the launch of our Developer Preview release for Vendia Share, enabling developers to experience the platform at no cost. Vendia is also pleased to announce the completion of our Series A investment, led by Canvas Ventures.

funding.title: Vendia Announces Series A Investment
funding.description: Vendia announces a $15.5M Series A investment, led by Canvas Ventures
funding.longDescription: Vendia is excited to announce the completion of a $15.5M Series A investment, led by Canvas Ventures with participation from BMW i Ventures, Sorenson Ventures, and our existing seed investors

file sharing.title: How to share Files in Vendia Share Unis
file sharing.description: Sharing data across different organizations, accounts, and regions used to be hard. This step-by-step example shows how Vendia Share makes it easy to share files in Unis and how to share files with other participants in a Uni while controlling read and write permissions.

seo.title: How to share Files in Vendia Share Unis
seo.description: Sharing data across different organizations, accounts, and regions used to be hard. This step-by-step example shows how Vendia Share makes it easy to share files in Unis and how to share files with other participants in a Uni while controlling read and write permissions.
seo.keywords: Universal applications, file sharing, cross-cloud file sharing

developers.title: Announcing the Vendia Share Developer Preview!
developers.description: Launch announcement for the Vendia Share Developer Preview and Vendia's Series A
developers.longDescription: Vendia is excited to announce the launch of our Developer Preview release for Vendia Share, enabling developers to experience the platform at no cost. Vendia is also pleased to announce the completion of our Series A investment, led by Canvas Ventures.

Ready to share code and data across accounts, regions, clouds, and partners? Ready to use any service from any cloud provider to build upon your real-time data? This post will get you started with everything you need to learn about unis and how to develop with Vendia Share
developers.title: The developer's punchlist for getting started with Vendia Share
developers.description: Whether you are a developer, business manager, or data scientist getting started with Vendia Share is fast and easy. In 10 minutes of less, you can start creating distributed real-time applications and sharing data across clouds, accounts, regions, and partners without sacrificing compliance or control.

seo.title: The developer's punchlist for getting started with Vendia Share
seo.description: Whether you are a developer, business manager, or data scientist getting started with Vendia Share is fast and easy. In 10 minutes of less, you can start creating distributed real-time applications and sharing data across clouds, accounts, regions, and partners without sacrificing compliance or control.

sidebarCta: Want to learn more about Vendia?

STAMTI.title: STAMTI: A New Model for Delivering Cloud-based Services
STAMTI.description: Learn about the STAMTI (single-tenanted accounts on multi-tenanted infrastructure) model
STAMTI.longDescription: In this post learn more about STAMTI (single-tenanted accounts on multi-tenanted infrastructure) and how it enables companies like Vendia to deliver services that are simultaneously easy for customers to adopt and use while still being secure, operationally isolated, and cost efficient.

seo.title: The developer's punchlist for getting started with Vendia Share
seo.description: Whether you are a developer, business manager, or data scientist getting started with Vendia Share is fast and easy. In 10 minutes of less, you can start creating distributed real-time applications and sharing data across clouds, accounts, regions, and partners without sacrificing compliance or control.

sidebarCta: Want to learn more about Vendia?

documents.longDescription: Ready to share code and data across accounts, regions, clouds, and partners? Ready to use any service from any cloud provider to build upon your real-time data? This post will get you started with everything you need to learn about unis and how to develop with Vendia Share

engineering, SQL, event.title: How tools impact products for real-time, multi-party data sharing
engineering, SQL, event.description: Beginning with a single server and a SQL database, we cover the tradeoffs needed to build a system that all the parties involved can trust and use to make transactions.

seo.description: Beginning with a single server and a SQL database, we cover the tradeoffs needed to build a system that all the parties involved can trust and use to make transactions.
seo.title: How tools impact products for real-time, multi-party data sharing

supply chain, manufacturing, traceabilit.title: Track and trace using Vendia Unis and Blobs
supply chain, manufacturing, traceabilit.description: Learn how Vendia Share's Unis and Blobs functionality can help streamline common supply chain track & trace issues.

seo.title: Track and trace using Vendia Unis and Blobs
seo.description: This article explores how Vendia's Uni technologies provide enterprises with a simple and cost-effective solution to track and trace challenges. CIOs, line of business owners, and developers who work on supply-chain-related technologies will gain insights into the best ways to lower costs, improve operational outcomes, and optimize their free cash flow by learning about Vendia Share technology.
seo.keywords: supply chain traceability, track and trace

tim wagner.title: Meet Vendia's founders
tim wagner.description: Meet Tim Wagner, Vendia's CEO, and Shruthi Rao, Vendia's CBO. They share their stories about how they came to partner as founders, and how Vendia came to life as an idea, a funded startup, and a breakthrough data sharing platform for the Web3 era.
